*R/gf_examples.R*

## gf_chain

## Description
Returns a chain graph of the given size with Long ID type.   The vertex IDs are 0, 1, ..., n-1, and the edges are (0, 1), (1, 2), ...., (n-2, n-1). 


## Usage
```r
gf_chain(sc, n) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| sc | A Spark connection. |
| n | Size of the graph to return. |





## Examples

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(graphframes)
gf_chain(sc, 5) 
```
:::
